answers.answer: Just did the urine collection a few weeks ago and I barely filled half the jug up .. no biggy they just didn't know how much you pee lol
No. I wouldn't even be able to fill up a whole jug in a day. But you have tonight & a little bit if tomorrow just try to fill as much as you can :)
What is a urine catch for?? Sorry I havent seen anything about them.
too much protein in urine they have you do a 24 hour pee test
especially if you have high blood pressure. i had to do the test a couple days ago because of my bp
Ooh ok. Thank you for explaining!

Ok cool cuz yeah I don't think I'm gonna be able to fill this whole thing.! Lol. And Yeah I had a seizure a couple of days ago so they're making me do it to test for preeclampsia, since I haven't had any problems my whole pregnancy until now.
I had to do that when I was preg with my daughter. Its not about how much you pee just getting it for that time frame. Good luck.
no prob.... seizures, blurred vision, headaches, rapid weight gain  elevated bp, no oxygen to the baby are some symptoms of it. only cure is delivery

question: So my dr now has me putting my pee into a jug after every time I use the bathroom and I have to take it to the hospital tomorrow when the 24 hours is over for testing. She gave me 2 jugs. My question is I started at 11 this morning and I haven't even filled half of a jug. I've been drinking a bunch of water and Gatorade. Is it bad if I don't fill up like at least a whole jug.?
title: 24 hour urine catch?
